Please identify the "Property Name" entities in the following paragraph. Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Property Name". Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

Paragraph: The number - average molecular weights ( M n ) of PTATDPP and PTAFDPP were 47.2 and 32.6 kDa with polydispersity indexes ( PDI ) of 2.1 and 2.5 , respectively , as determined by size - exclusion chromatography.

Let's think step by step.

| Property Name |
| --- |
| average molecular weights (Mn) |
| polydispersity indexes (PDI) |

The two property names identified in the paragraph are "average molecular weights (Mn)" and "polydispersity indexes (PDI)". These are both quantitative properties of the polymers PTATDPP and PTAFDPP, and are determined using size-exclusion chromatography.

Please remove entities that do not clearly refer to "Material property" and present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Property Name".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

| Property Name |
| --- |
| average molecular weights (Mn) |
| polydispersity indexes (PDI) |

After reviewing the paragraph, the only entities that clearly refer to material properties are "average molecular weights (Mn)" and "polydispersity indexes (PDI)". These are both quantitative properties of the polymers PTATDPP and PTAFDPP, and are determined using size-exclusion chromatography. The other entities in the paragraph, such as "kDa" and "size-exclusion chromatography", are units of measurement or techniques used to determine the properties, but are not themselves material properties.
